name: Infection (SirSalt, Tekitnu, Mark)
description:
This Game is our project for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1.

this game was made with a 3 man team over the last week.

Mark Duisters
https://markdu.itch.io/
https://markduisters.com/

Thomas Pé
https://tekitnu.itch.io/

Stijn Bellemans
https://sirsalt.itch.io

With the theme being "Stronger Together" we thought of making a hive game, where you play as Bacteria to infect the human body through their veins.

You control the bacteria by using the "WASD"  or "ZQSD" keys 
on qwerty and azerty respectively.

The goal of the game is to amass more Bacteria, dodge the White blood cells and in the end infect the human hearth.

Supported platforms:

Win 10 64-bit
Linux (Ubuntu/Debian) 64-bit

If you played the game. Please leave a rating and a comment! We love feedback, especially on issues, game-play quirks and bugs!
